quote: The future is fluid. Each act, each decision, and each development creates new possibilities and eliminates others. The future is ours to direct.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: I would like to see an end to war, poverty, and unnecessary human suffering. But I can't see it in a monetary-based system where the richest nations control most of the world's resources.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: In order to design a future of positive change, we must first become expert at changing our minds.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: To prepare for the future, we must be willing to test new concepts.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: It takes a different value system if you wish to change the world.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: Our dominant values that emphasize competition and scarcity limit continued progress.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: While we cannot predict the future, we will most surely live it. Every action and decision we take - or don't - ripples into the future. For the first time, we have the capability, the technology, and the knowledge to direct those ripples.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We are not here by chance. We are here by design. As conscious beings, we have the ability to design our own future.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The only way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We are the future. We are the change we seek.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We are the architects of our own destiny.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The future is not a gift. It is an achievement.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: Let us dream of the future, so that we may create it.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The greatest danger for most of us is not that we set our aim too high and miss it, but that we set our aim too low and achieve it.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the possibilities of tomorrow.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The only thing that is constant is change.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We are the product of our environment, but we are also the creators of our own reality.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The future is not a place we go to, but rather a place we create.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The only thing that is predictable about the future is that it will be different from the present.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The future is not something that happens to us, it is something that we create.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The only way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The future belongs to those who are willing to learn and change.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The future is not something to be feared, it is something to be embraced.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The future is ours to create. Let us make it a bright one.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The future is not something that just happens to us, it is something that we make. And the choices we make today will determine the kind of future we have.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We are the first generation that can end all wars, poverty, and hunger for everyone. We are the last generation that can choose to do so.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The future is not a gift. It is an achievement.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: Science is the greatest adventure of the human spirit.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The universe is not a machine, it is a living organism.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We are all connected, and we must learn to live together in harmony.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We must create a world where everyone has the opportunity to reach their full potential.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We must design a future where everyone has access to clean water, food, and shelter.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We must create a world where everyone is treated with respect and dignity.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We must create a world where everyone is free to live their life to the fullest.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We are the future, and we have the power to create a better world.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: Let us dream of a better future, and let us work together to make it a reality.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We are the architects of our own destiny.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: Technology is not good or bad, it is neutral. It is up to us to use it for good or for evil.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We must learn to live in harmony with nature, not against it.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: Education is the key to a better future.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We must learn to think critically and question everything.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We must be open to new ideas and perspectives.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We must work together to create a better future for all.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We are the future, and we have the power to create the world we want to live in.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: Let us be the change we wish to see in the world.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Jacque Fresco

quote: We are all connected, and we must learn to live together in harmony.
author: Jacque Fresco
